segments.text: Hello . Holiday Inn . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I booked a single room in your hotel for this Friday . But I ’ m sorry to say that I have to cancel it . My wife is very sick now . I don ’ t think she ’ ll be able to travel by this Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I ’ m sorry to hear that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Can I cancel my reservation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I have canceled your reservation , Mr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . I hope your wife is feeling better soon .
segments.speaker: S1
